entry.title: One Line
entry.content:
• Weâ€™ve always fooled around together since we were kids.
    • Weâ€™ve shared the most exciting moments, but every story has an end.
    • No one can stay a kid forever.
    • Time moves on, and people grow up.
    • We must go our separate ways.
    • You keep going even after Im gone.
entry.summary: <ul> <li>Weâ€™ve always fooled around together since we were kids.<ul> <li>Weâ€™ve shared the most exciting moments, but every story has an end.

ç»å¯¹å…ƒç´ å±…ä¸­å®šä½

entry.title: Windows Setting
entry.content:
Win10 LTSB Add MicrosoftStore

  • To : LTSB-Add-MicrosoftStore
  • Run: Add-Store.cmd

Windows show Windows/File

  • explorer .

  • start .

  • è®¡ç®—æœº\HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\Directory\Background\shell

Install Chocolatey

  • At PowerShell
    • Set-ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Scope Process -Force; [System.Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [System.Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol -bor 3072; iex ((New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadString('https://chocolatey.org/install.ps1'))
  • https://chocolatey.org/install
  • At CMD
    • @powershell Set-ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Scope Process -Force; [System.Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [System.Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol -bor 3072; iex ((New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadString('https://chocolatey.org/install.ps1'))
